overview: A family is stuck together on Christmas Eve during a snowstorm. Mrs. Bell uses it as an opportunity to ask her rich sister, Fable, for money. To succeed in her task, she needs the evening to be perfect, so she hires a maid named Arya to help her daughter Eve clean the house during the evening. Everything was fine until her drunk husband brings Fableâ€™s ex-girlfriend, Lola to the party. Unfortunately for Mrs. Bell, Lola will not be her only problem that night because her other sister-in-law, Fabula is mentally unstable and can explode at any moment. It will certainly be a long night at the Bell house this Christmas.
title: A Lesbian Christmas Story
